title: Work Policy Contract (WPC) v1
description:
A Work Policy Contract (WPC) defines enforceable constraints for confidential work runs (provider/model allowlists, redaction rules, receipt privacy mode, and egress allowlist).

Canonical policy_hash_b64u (v1): SHA-256 base64url of the RFC8785 JCS canonical JSON string of the WPC payload (sha256(JCS(payload))).

issuer_did.description: DID of the enterprise/buyer issuing the policy.

allowed_providers.description: Optional provider allowlist. If omitted/empty, the gateway MAY allow all supported providers.

minimum_model_identity_tier.description: Optional minimum required model identity tier (orthogonal to PoH tiers). Gateways MUST fail closed when only a weaker tier is available.

required_audit_packs.description: Optional required audit packs by deterministic audit_pack_hash_b64u (see ADR 0001). Used for policy gating (verify-under-policy / procurement requirements).

redaction_rules.description: Optional redaction rules applied by the gateway before upstream requests are made and before hashing/receipting.

receipt_privacy_mode.description: Receipt privacy mode policy. In confidential mode, gateways may force hash_only.

egress_allowlist.description: Optional egress allowlist (hostnames / patterns) for future mediated egress receipts.
